info.name: Lexicon [Dark Theme]
info.description: Lexicon, a mod menu unlike no other. It's available for PS3 and can be bought from NextGenUpdate. If you are modding at night or love to participate in the Lexicon Chat like myself, then I would recommend using this dark theme to help your eyes. ^~^
info.additionalInfo:
[v1.5] 2/16/2017:
- Updated some of the elements for the newly created pages and brightened some of the text to make things more readable.

----------------------------------------------

[v1.0] 7/17/2016:
- Initial release
